title: Empowering Women in Tech
abstract: An inspiring and hands-on session designed to empower women in the cloud industry! We’ll dive into practical strategies for fostering diversity, creating inclusive spaces, and closing the gender gap in tech. Together, we’ll explore ways to break barriers, amplify voices, and drive meaningful change. Expect insights on public speaking, content creation, organizing user groups, and building strong professional networks. Whether you’re just starting or a seasoned pro, this workshop is packed with actionable takeaways to help you grow, connect, and make an impact. Let’s learn, share, and uplift each other because the cloud needs all of us!
